burn_heal.name: Burn Heal
burn_heal.description: Cures a Pokemon of a burn.

ice_heal.name: Ice Heal
ice_heal.description: Cures a Pokemon of being frozen.

revive.name: Revive
revive.description: Revives a fainted Pokemon with half HP.

pokeball.name: Poke Ball
pokeball.description: A device for catching wild Pokemon.

greatball.name: Great Ball
greatball.description: A good ball with a higher catch rate than a Poke Ball.

ultraball.name: Ultra Ball
ultraball.description: An ultra-performance ball with a higher catch rate than a Great Ball.

escape_rope.name: Escape Rope
escape_rope.description: Escape from a cave or dungeon.

repel.name: Repel
repel.description: Prevents weak Pokemon encounters for 100 steps.

oaks_parcel.name: Oak's Parcel
oaks_parcel.description: A parcel to be delivered to Prof. Oak from Viridian City's Poke Mart.

pokedex.name: Pokedex
pokedex.description: A high-tech encyclopedia that records data on all Pokemon seen and caught.

town_map.name: Town Map
town_map.description: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime.

boulder_badge.name: Boulder Badge
boulder_badge.description: The first Gym Badge. Pokemon up to Lv. 20 will obey.
